componentAttributes.label: For outage please click here and call us

componentAttributes.articlesSubtitle: Type something on the Ticket Description and hit enter key to search for Knowledge Articles.
componentAttributes.caseCreationInfo: Attention: Outage or critical severity support tickets cannot be created in the portal. Please find below emergency contact details.
componentAttributes.caseCreationSearchLabel: Please describe your issue and include product info for better search results
componentAttributes.caseDetailsInfo:
To ensure data privacy, please DO NOT enter any of the following types of information in the “Description” field: 

An IP address
A MAC address
A phone number

Any of the above types of information, if typed in the “Description” field, will be made unreadable. If you need to include this information, please upload in an attachment.
